summary.span: Contiene classi che supportano l'interoperatività dei controlli Windows Form e WPF.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il dello spazio dei nomi contiene classi che consentono l'interazione tra il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologie.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. Quando si usa classi, è possibile ospitare [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] ai controlli [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pagine, e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementi [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-applicazioni basate su.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. Sono le due classi principali che implementano le capacità di interoperatività e .The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . La classe da utilizzare dipende dall'implementazione del controllo:Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Usare la classe quando è necessario usare una [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control per un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pagina.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Usare la classe quando è necessario usare una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento in un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-applicazione basata su.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
